attributes.review: once i downloaded this atrocious app my sink water immediately turned into a deep mahogany color. i don’t know how to fix this issue

attributes.review: LITERALLY STOLE MY CAT AWAY FROM ME AND I STILL TO THIS DAY HAVE NO IDEA WHERE HE IS, all the pictures where just of oranges 🍊🍊 which was so weird and the app started to tell me to drive of a cliff AND WHEN U GET THIS APP YOU BETTER HIDE YOUR WIFE HIDE YOUR KIDS BECAUSE IT WILL STEAL THEM JUST LIKE IT STOLE MY CAT.
attributes.title: TRASH APP

attributes.review: This app is garbage it robbed me of my time and my cookie stash. I can’t even have chips ahoy anymore. This makes me sad but also mad.
attributes.title: App review

attributes.review: It will steal your Dino nuggies. After I downloaded this I couldn’t find my cat or dog. It even good all my food from my fridge. Get rid of it.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app my phone caught on fire and my refrigerator disappeared!! Don’t get this app!!!! Absolutely terrible!!!👎🏽👎🏽

attributes.review: I couldn’t even navigate the app because every time I’d try to reserve a rally ticket it called me a slur. 🤷‍♀️

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded it my phone caught on fire. that is after glitching for hours right after download! i couldn’t even open the app. it kept kicking me out before even opening. worst app experience i’ve ever had.
